Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: All applications have been updated and enhanced to the latest specifications.
Program_Info.Program_System_Requirements: All Windows Systems - 32 bit and 64 bit

English.Char_Desc_45: A small yet powerful office suite.
English.Char_Desc_80: A small powerful office suite that meets all your demands.
English.Char_Desc_250: The benefits of the SSuite Personal office suite are its small size, the independence of any third party software necessary to run on, and that it can operate on any Windows platform with a consistent graphical user interface. It also incorporates a PDF c
English.Char_Desc_450: The benefits of the SSuite Personal office suite are its small size, the independence of any third party software necessary to run on, and that it can operate on any Windows platform with a consistent graphical user interface. It also incorporates a PDF creator for true document format compatibility.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
With its full 32-bit architecture and stability, SSuite Personal Edition can improve your productivity and document format compatibility.
The benefits of the SSuite Personal office suite are its small size, the independence of any third party software necessary to run on, and that it can operate on any Windows platform with a consistent graphical user interface. It also incorporates a PDF creator for true document format compatibility.
SSuite Office - Personal Edition contains the following:
- SpreadForm One An easy to use Spreadsheet Application - WordFormat 2 A General Wordprocessor Application - My EZMail For all your E-mail requirements - My WebBrowser Pro Surfing the Net has never been easier - Envelope Printer Print Addresses and Labels on Envelopes - PDF Memo Creator Create PDF documents with graphics - The Sorting Machine Sort any type of data element real fast - Address Book Store all those important addresses - Internet Timer Keep your phone bill in check
Here are some key features of SSuite Office - Personal Edition:
- Modern updated interface - Full 32-bit Software - No Annual Licence Fees - Easy Installation(No Restarts) - Unlimited Document History - Supports Hyper Threading Technology - Three levels or less Menu functionality - ODBC Database Connectivity - Inter-Application Startups - SSuite Office was designed and built for all WIN32 API Platforms
What's New in This Release:
- New Address Book added - Colourful Emoticons have been added to WordFormat - Tetris 2D game has been added for those boring times - WordFormat is now capable of exporting any document to PDF - All applications now have new updated and refreshing interfaces - All utilities and applications have been updated for an enhanced user experience - New spreadsheet updates for better compatibility with all Windows operating systems
